title: Until Dawn Successor Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.17.22
description:
Tam and Tim reunite for another Tim Tam Thursday to talk Halo, Resident Evil, The Quarry, and more!

Follow Tam on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:00 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Tunic Review! Andy and Janet have both played through the game and join Greg and Blessing to talk all about it. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

SPEAKING OF GAMESCAST: Review Season is in overdrive right now. Next week look forward to TWO review Gamescasts dropping. Keep your eyes on the feeds and fingers on the bell so you can get notified when they go live.

The new Mario Kart 8 Deluxe DLC drops sometime tonight, so make sure to join us tomorrow right here on twitch.tv/kindafunngames after Games Daily to watch Barrett & Tim play the new cups for the very first time AND join him for some multiplayer goodness!

The Roper Report  -

00:10:44 - Until Dawn Dev’s New Game is The Quarry
00:20:58 - Halo TV Show Reviews
00:30:06 - GoldenEye Video Game Trademark Renewed Amid Remaster Rumors
00:36:25 - Resident Evil Live-Action Series Gets July Release Date On Netflix And New Posters
00:43:42 - Ads
00:45:53 - Out today
00:48:23 - You‘re Wrong
00:49:07 - How's Tim Getting on with Games?
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Bless
